Santa_Monica.Hillcrest Country Club (Los Angeles):
Hillcrest Country Club is a private social club located in the Cheviot Hills neighborhood of Los Angeles, California, United States.


== The club ==
Located at 10000 Pico Boulevard across the street from Fox Studios, Hillcrest was the first Los Angeles country club for the city's Jewish community. In 1972, the Los Angeles Times referred to Hillcrest as "the leading Jewish country club in Southern California." The property includes an 18-hole golf course and tennis courts, and serves as a meeting place for its members.
